control.progress:
#!/system/bin/sh

if [ $(cat /sys/class/leds/led:flash_torch/low_brightness) -eq 0 ]; then
  echo 0
  exit
fi

a=$(cat /sys/class/leds/led:flash_torch/low_brightness); let "a = (a - 2) / 13 + 1)"

echo $a
control.title: LED Default Brightness
control.description: Changes torch default brightness value. Stock: 8. This value can not be higher than High Brightness mode value.
